newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU says reviews Promodes buy of Gruppo G.
newsitem.headline: EU says reviews Promodes buy of Gruppo G.

text.p: The European Commission said on Wednesday it had started a preliminary probe into French retailer Promodes SA increased stake in Italian hyper and supermarket Gruppo G Srl.

It said the deal was submitted for clearance on November 13 under the European Union's merger rules. The Commission has a month from that date to clear the operation or start a four-month in-depth investigation.
Promodes said in September it had raised its stake in Gruppo G to 80 percent from 34.5 percent. -- Brussels newsroom 322 2876841
